column5: My wife got me this lamp!  I know most of you are jealous, but it is a major award and is obviously quite fragile.... HH
Nice!!! Did you give your kids a red ryder bb gun too?
Awesome Joe!!! Fra jill lay  My daughter made me a card that says,  Happy Valentines Day Friend Dad.  Cute, it's a keeper.

Here's the funniest part Phil.... Once I got it un-packed, I suggested that we put it in the front window, so everyone could see it... I got that look! (if you are marrried, you know the look!) I then suggested that perhaps the mantle on the fireplace, in the family room, where it can be seen would be better... the "look" intensified! I then suggested that it would make a great lamp beside our bed, as it has a nice soft glow to it's light... I didn't know that a face could look like that!  So, as of now, it's sitting on the kitchen table, awaiting the verdict on it's final placement... I just hope that it doesn't meet with an untimely demise! HH
Go get something on your way home for your better half or you ain't goin fishing any time soon.
oh dang... is that why all my stuff is at the curb?
I went out and bought the new Twilight DVD so my wife can watch it tonight and I can go tie bucktails in the garage
The V word
We had new porcelain tile installed in one of the bathrooms last week and we're doing the kitchen & dining room floors next week.  Is that romantic enough of a gift ??
Hey Lew, I was thinking a kinking thing,,,,,,,,,,,,,,   Ah,  :devil:   never mind.  :rofl2:
Yes, you out did your self ....lol
I went to the river and caught a fresh fish for supper....
I  aranged the frige magnets today  in the shape of a heart . Now she wants me to take her out for dinner , i should have left the frige magnets a lone...........
Supper... Mario party... And some private time...  And she's happy...  I'm one lucky guy...
Dont know why mine didnt like the new braid i picked up for her reel...... She said ''Theres more to life than fishing'' I said '' Well......................No''
Well ... almost Lew .. if it was 'ensuite' bath ... and you plucked a few rose petals ... I'm thinkin you're good for some - some
Did she at least pay you for your gas to get to the restaurant?  Sorry, it was stronger than dirt.
hahaha, give her an inch and she wants a mile.  I making walleye a la alfredo tonight. It's just walleye meat in alfredo sauce.
I get the feeling that shot is gunna keep coming for a long time...lol
you devil !!!!! Better than Lew plucking his nose hairs.  I swear, thats what i saw when i first read it Roy  Brain Bleach please
Huh ????....what'd I miss
I got my girlfriend a baby for Valebtines day. Started it 9 months ago and looks like it is going to be late lol. Regardless I'm not going fishing or getting any private time.
i made her a card with crayons from me and our almost 2 year old daughter and had her scribble and fill in the heart. brownie points X 1000
Nothin......

I took Kelly out for dinner on sunday to the keg. We both had the same meals, French onion soup Ny striploin steak which came with ceaser salad,baked potato& vegetables. She had a glass of wine & I had a diet pepsi.  A $104 plus the tip =$120, Next year were fasting .
Funny , do they all want fish on V day ...lol ,we just got back from going out for fish & chips ... her choice .

Well, I went to the mall after work, and realized I forgot my wallet at work. I was supposed to get dinner to eat in, but I only had the spare change in the car. I had 17 dollars and 63 cents. I bought a pre barbequed chicken, potatoe wedges, a can of green giant corn(peaches and cream), and I have enough spare to buy a no name box of ferreroo rochie's. I appologized when I got home. Explained the situation. We ate dinner, and she went to bed. Now I am on OFC, watching the hockey game with the couch to myself...         Winning!!!!!!
Man, I like your style.    I made Blue Cheese Linguine with Buffalo Walleye.  My little missy was happy.
Gave my valentine 8 1/2 lbs of gold on Saturday
